data.text: Yesu tsakawakema hamwe iwanang'ina wake kumi na weli, kaweng'a uwetso wa ukulapfa pfinyamkela na kuhonetsa utamu na maghayo ghose.
Aghano igho ghamataghwa ghe iwatumighwa kumi na weli, wa mwanduso; Simoni iyakemighwe Petiri na ndughu yake Andereya, Jakobu na ndughu yake Yohane, iwana wa Sebedayo.
Filipi na Batalomeyo, Tomasi na Matei iyakalile imsola kodi; na Jakobu imwana wa Alifayo, na Tadei,
Simoni Mkananayo na Yuda Isikarioti iyamsaliti Yesu.
Yesu tsakawatuma Iwatumighwa awo, kawalaghitsa, “Mleke kughenda kwe iwanu ing'awammanyile Imulungu bae, au mne isi tse Wasamariya.
Ila mghende kwe iwanu we isi ya Isiraeli yawaghile ka iwang'olo.
Hamghenda, muwapetele mbuli ino, ‘Undewa we Imulungu wa habehi.’
Muwahonetse iwatamu, muwatsilihule iwafile, muwahonetse wakoma, mlapfe pfinyamkela. Mwemwe mbokela hela, apfo lapfeni hela.
Mleke kusola nzahabu, pfetsa, shaba mne pfibindo pfenu.
Mleke kusola mkoba we ghumwanza, wala ghamaghwanda meli, wala imikwabatsa, wala ing'weku. Kwaapfila mtenda isang'ano kobamighwa yeng'ighwe maliho ghake.
“Hamkwingila mne isi au kaye yoyose, mbame imunu yanoghile, mkale mng'anda amwo mbaka hamkuka.
Hamkwingila mng'anda, mlonge, ‘Mkale tseghamba.’
Wenye kaye wang'ambokelani, nawo watsokala tseghamba, lekeni ka ng'awombokelani bae, mwemwe mtsokala tseghamba.
Imunu wowose ang'alema kuwabokela, au kutegheletsa mbuli tsenu, hamkuka mkung'use litimbwisi ilili mmaghulu mwenu.
Nowalongela ghendo mne litsuwa lya kuhigha, itsakuwa ng'apfu kwa Sodoma na Gomola, kubita kwe isi ayo.
“Nowatuma ka iwang'olo iwali mghati mwe wambwa wa kumuhulo. Apfo mwobamighwa mkengele ka nzoka na muhole ka njiwa.
Mwalangitse ne iwanu, kwaapfila wasowaghala mne mabalatsa, kuya watsowafapula mne tsing'anda tse ukulombela.
Mtsoghalighwa hambele he iwakulu ne iwandewa kwaajili ya nene, mpete Imbuli Inoghile kuna wawo na kwe iwanu ing'awammanyile Imulungu.
Hamtsoghalighwa mne libalatsa, mleke kwalangula mtsolonga choni, kwaapfila mtsakwing'ighwa gha ukulonga mne chipindi chicho,
kwaapfila si mwemwe bae yamlonga, ila Ghumuhe wa Aba wenu katsolonga kubitila mwemwe.
“Ndughu katsomsaliti ndughu yake yakomighwe, na aba katsomsaliti imwanaghe, nawo iwana watsowasaliti aba tsawo na kuwakoma.
Iwanu wose watsowahila kwaajili ya taghwa lyangu, lekeni ayula iyodudumila mbaka utsighilo katsokombolighwa.
Hamdununzighwa mne isi imwe, mtsumile isi ingi, nowalongelani ghendo ng'amtsomalitsa bae isang'ano yenu mne isi tsose tsa Isiraeli ng'ana Imwana we Imunu yatse.
“Mwanang'ina ng'ombita bae imlangulitsi wake, wala imtumwa ng'ombita bae imtwatsa wake.

Yotosha imwanang'ina kwighala ne imlangulitsi wake, na mtumwa kwighala ne imtwatsa wake. Ka imbala we ing'anda kokemighwa Belisebuli, angu iwanu iwali mng'anda mwake ng'awatsokemighwa mataghwa ghehile ng'ani?
“Apfo mleke kupfuka iwanu. Chochose ichighubikighwe, chitsoghubulighwa na chochose ichipfisighwe chitsakoneka.
Achila choniwalongelani mchisi, mwemwe mchilonge mne ghumwanga. Achila chamuhulika chinyelenyele, mwemwe mchikemelele kwa kwima mchiswili.
Mleke kuwapfuka awala iwokoma lukuli ila ng'awodaha bae kuukoma muhe, ila mumpfuke ayula iyodaha kuhinya lukuli na muhe mne ghumoto wa jehanamu.
Apfi iwasolwe weli ng'awoghulighwa kwa sendi imwe bae? Lekeni kuduhu yumwe iyolaghala hasi ka Aba wenu ng'abamile bae.
Hata tsimvili itsili mwitwi mwenu tsipetighwa.
Apfo mleke kupfuka, mwemwe mnogha kubita iwasolwe awo!
“Imunu wowose iyonitoghola nene hambele he iwanu, nene pfipfila nitsomtoghola hambele ha Aba wangu yali kulanga.
Lekeni imunu wowose iyonibela nene hambele he iwanu, na nene nitsombela hambele ha Aba wangu yali kulanga.
“Mleke kupfikitsa ka nene nitsa kuwatenda iwanu wakale tseghamba muisi. Mbe! Sitsile bae kuwatenda iwanu wakale tseghamba, ila nighala lipanga.
Kwaapfila nitsa kuwatenda mwisonge, imunu na aba wake, imwana na mai wake, mwalipfala na mwalipfala wake.
Na iwehile we imunu watsokuwa iwanu wa mkaye mwake.
“Imunu wowose iyomnoghela aba na mai wake kubita nene, ayo ng'oninoghela bae. Na imunu iyowanoghela iwanaghe kubita nene, ayo ng'oninoghela bae.
Na imunu wowose yang'osola ghumsalaba ghwake na kuniwinza, ayo ng'oninoghela bae.
Imunu wowose iyobama ughima wake katsowaghisa, na wowose iyowaghisa ughima wake kwaajili ya nene, katsowona.
“Ayula iyowabokelani mwemwe, konibokela nene, na ayula yonibokela nene, kombokela ayula iyanitumile.
Imunu wowose iyombokela nabii kwaapfila yeye nabii, ayo katsobokela ghweko lya nabii, na imunu wowose iyombokela imunu iyanoghile kwaapfila yeye kanogha, katsobokela ghweko lya imunu iyanoghile.
Nowalongelani ghendo, imunu wowose iyomwing'a chikombe che ghamatsi ighopfegha imunu yumwe we iwadodo wano kwaapfila yeye ka yumwe we iwanang'ina wangu, katsopata ghweko lyake.”
